summary: This Mod adds break undies and undress system that you can take off enemy\'s clothes by damage.
descriptionHtml:
Sky Stripper WIP
version 0.4

This Mod adds break undies and undress system that you can take off enemy\'s clothes by damage.
And you will be made to take off clothes by damage.
Player can be taken off all clothes including DLC and other mods from version 0.2 .
Strip enchantment can move another weapon.

[color=#ff0000]AFTER UPDATE TO VER0.4,REFRESH(ON >> OFF >> ON) TOGGLE?OPTION OF THIS MOD(General section) IN MCM TO ENABLE NEW FUNCTION.[/color]

REQUIREMENTS
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
SkyUI

*This mod contains \"Combination Vanilla Outfit for UNP\".(Supported weight 0 Only)

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
How to Play

1: Install this Mod.
2: Turn on toggle option and change enemy\'s outfit with MCM.
3: Kill Jack the Stripper and get weapon.(Jack is in Windhelm)
4: Attack enemy with weapon.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
version 0.4
Featured Break Undies.You can easily add Break Undies armor.
Add one BU armor two color variations.
Change function of equip hotkey from equip all to equip only as for the number depending on HP. This change is to avoid slowdown by wearing many clothes at the same time in battle. At first, please recover health.
Change body slot from 56 to 46 (Iron Armor Tops/Iron Armor Tops Var/Steel Iron Armor Tops).
AFTER UPDATE,REFRESH(ON >> OFF >> ON) TOGGLE?OPTION OF THIS MOD(General section) IN MCM TO ENABLE NEW FUNCTION.

version 0.32
Fix bug about repeating push Hotkey

version 0.31
Fix bug that enemy who died instantly did not take off clothes.
Some npc are able to changed clothes.

version 0.3
Support Mod Configuration Menu(MCM).
Enemy\'s outfit can be changed individually with MCM.
Add two Hotkeys( Store Armors/Equip Armors )
Add option that you can always be took off clothes depending on HP.
Fix body slot(Head Bandages)

version 0.21
Fix some clipping.
Fix body slot(Arm Bandages/Spike Braceret/Wench Braceret).
Add three items(Iron Armor Tops/Iron Armor Tops Var/Steel Iron Armor Tops).

version 0.2
Change system to using SKSE.
Strip Condition have been changed from every time you attack to dependence on HP.
All clothes(DLC and other mod) come off now and you no longer need to add clothes to esp.
Undressing is now reflected in the immediate.

**Please do not use savedata with old version(ver0.01) if you update to upper version of this mod.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Information

Please backup Data folder and use another save before install

I had more than half a year away from making MOD, I\'ve forgotten how to use Nifskope?and Blender.
Fix clipping and Making equipments that conform to weight-slider might be a little difficult.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
**Known Bugs

Some female npc don\'t wear equipments of this Mod.
While you attack enemy wearing BreakUndies Clothes, enemy may wear clothes again.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
**Notes

Equipments that has contained in this mod conform to weight 0 only.

If you want to add BU clothes or change enemy\'s outfit, please see txt and html included.(CreationKit required)

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Function Description

- Power of Undress (Enchantment)
When you are attacked while you have this debuff, you will be taken off enemy\'s clothes by damage.

- Victim of Strip (Debuff)
Debuff which be taken off clothes by damage.
When you get this from enemy, you can cancel this debuff by changing clothes.

- Break Undies(BU) supported clothes
When you are attacked while you have strip debuff, clothes will break more and more.
Choices appear when you drop BU clothes, and you can repair BU clothes when you choose \'Repair\' or \'Full Repair\'.
Clothes with a special keyword don\'t take off until the end, you will remain clothed.

Option menu
- I am always stripper ( General )
You always have debuff while you turn on toggle.
You get debuff, but not get enchantment.
To repair BU Clothes, You must have this option enabled.

- Strip Condition ( General )
still not working

- Hotkey ( General )
-- Enable
You can use Hotkey while you turn on toggle.
-- Equip Armors ( General )
Set hotkey to equip clothes to the point that is allowed by the current health.
As for BU clothes that destruction advanced, clothes that you don\'t have now aren\'t equipped.
-- Set?Armors ( General )
Set hotkey to restore set of clothes which you wear now.

- Ememy of changing outfit ( Details )
change outfit of various humanoid monsters.
It takes time for a while until changing is over.

- People of changing outfit ( Details )
change outfit of citizen etc.
Ver0.4, only some NPC can be changed.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Version History

2013/01/31?ver0.4
2013/01/24?ver0.31
2013/01/23?ver0.3
2013/01/14?ver0.2
2013/01/08 ver0.01

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
How to get equipments

All items are contained in the box at the bottom of the desk in test cell.
The test cell will be able to move with the following command.

coc qasmoke

Please coc command again when you want to go back.

ex:
coc whiterunorigin

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Install

Unzip and drop contents into Skyrim Data folder and activate combinationVanillaOutfit.esp or use Nexus Mod Manager.

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Uninstall

Uncheck all option in General and Details section of MCM before uninstall.
Delete following folders and combinationVanillaOutfit.esp from your skyrim/data folder.

combinationVanillaOutfit.esp
meshes\\clothes\\hn
textures\\Clothes\\hn

-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
Special Thanks
anano

Credits
Bethesda for Skyrim.
dimon99 for UNP.(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)
the author of the Anonymous 2ch.net user for Skirt
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) (http://skse.silverlock.org/)
author: sesamin

files.changelogHtml:
Change body slot from 56 to 46 (Iron Armor Tops/Iron Armor Tops Var/Steel Iron Armor Tops).
Change function of equip hotkey from equip all to equip only as for the number depending on HP. This change is to avoid slowdown by wearing many clothes at the same time in battle. At first, please recover health.
Add one BU armor two color variations.
Featured Break Undies.You can easily add Break Undies armor.
